net.sf.mmm.util.nls.impl.formatter

Class FormatterProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.nls.impl.formatter.FormatterProvider

  • public final class FormatterProvider
extends Object
    This class provides Formatters for various types. It contains the formatting logic for various implementations of SimpleNlsFormatter. This way it is easier to maintain GWT compatibility by replacing this class.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Formatter using Format.
      private static class  FormatterProvider.Iso8601Formatter
      Formatter for Date or Calendar using Iso8601Util.

    • Method Detail

      • convertStyle

        private static int convertStyle(String style)
        This method converts the given style to the according DateFormat-style constant.
        Parameters:
        style - is the style to convert.
        Returns:
        the according DateFormat-style constant (e.g. DateFormat.MEDIUM).

      • getDateFormatter

        public static Formatter<Object> getDateFormatter(Locale locale,
                                                 String type,
                                                 String style)
        Parameters:
        locale - is the Locale.
        type - is the type (must be one of NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_DATE, NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_TIME, NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_DATETIME).
        style - is the style.
        Returns:
        the FormatterProvider for Integer.

      • getDateFormatter

        public static Formatter<Object> getDateFormatter(Locale locale,
                                                 String pattern)
        Parameters:
        locale - is the Locale.
        pattern - is the custom format pattern.
        Returns:
        the FormatterProvider for Integer.

      • getDateFormatter

        public static Formatter<Object> getDateFormatter(Locale locale,
                                                 String type,
                                                 Iso8601Util iso8601Util)
        Parameters:
        locale - is the Locale.
        type - is the type (must be one of NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_DATE, NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_TIME, NlsFormatterManager.TYPE_DATETIME).
        iso8601Util - is the Iso8601Util.
        Returns:
        the FormatterProvider for Integer.
